solution_line_template: Grace mowed lawns for {mow_hours} hours at ${mow_rate}/hour, so earned {mow_hours} * {mow_rate} = $<<{mow_hours}*{mow_rate}={mow_earnings}>>{mow_earnings}.
Grace pulled weeds for {weed_hours} hours at ${weed_rate}/hour, so earned {weed_hours} * {weed_rate} = $<<{weed_hours}*{weed_rate}={weed_earnings}>>{weed_earnings}.
Grace put down mulch for {mulch_hours} hours at ${mulch_rate}/hour, so earned {mulch_hours} * {mulch_rate} = $<<{mulch_hours}*{mulch_rate}={mulch_earnings}>>{mulch_earnings}.
